column3: One thing that annoys me is when you see women in these terrible and incredible situations with perfectly glossed lips. You're not going to look good in the apocalypse.
When it comes to meeting and attracting women, many men are resigned and complacent. We figure some guys were born with that particular power and other guys weren't. I wasn't.
I don't get all the women that I want... I get all the women that want me.

I'm nostalgic for the future I knew as a kid. Back then, it was a lovely, bleepy, heavenly land populated by svelte men in white polo necks, who would lounge on big white sofas sipping blue wine from big glass globes, beside women like the ones on the covers of Hedkandi chill out compilations.
Younger women have no problem in reconciling beauty with ambitions as a professional woman.
I like intelligent women. When you go out, it shouldn't be a staring contest.
Being the boss anywhere is lonely. Being a female boss in a world of mostly men is especially so.
Women need space and silence. We too quickly give away our energy. There's something about holding that richness.
The story of the human race is the story of men and women selling themselves short.

Clearly older women and especially older women who have led an active life or elder women who successfully maneuver through their own family life have so much to teach us about sharing, patience, and wisdom.
If men knew all that women think, they would be twenty times more audacious.
Women are the first to jump on what is fashionable.
We're getting ready to take over the world. My group of girlfriends - we're renegades.
In too many instances, the march to globalization has also meant the marginalization of women and girls. And that must change.
If women were particular about men's characters, they would never get married at all.
The only really happy folk are married women and single men.
Women have simple tastes. They get pleasure out of the conversation of children in arms and men in love.
One can find women who have never had one love affair, but it is rare indeed to find any who have had only one.
There are few virtuous women who are not bored with their trade.
I've yet to be on a campus where most women weren't worrying about some aspect of combining marriage, children, and a career. I've yet to find one where many men were worrying about the same thing.
Some of us are becoming the men we wanted to marry.
You can tell the strength of a nation by the women behind its men.
Women in love are less ashamed than men. They have less to be ashamed of.
There is a physical relationship with a woman that you don't have with anybody else, but that's not about love. Love is a spiritual thing.
I'm not denyin' the women are foolish. God Almighty made 'em to match the men.
It's incredibly unfair. You don't see a lot of 60-year-old women with 20-year-old men onscreen.
